Notes

Issued in a clear PVC jacket that contains a locking flap which is fastened in place if inserted underneath said tab. The rear of the jacket features a plastic strip approximately 1" in width that is attached to the sides of the jacket. A hype sticker is affixed to the upper-left corner of the jacket with the following text: "LIMITED EDITION OF 1000" [sic]. Published by Relapse Release Music (ASCAP) All rights for North and South America controlled and administered by Rykomusic, Inc. (ASCAP) All rights for the rest of the world controlled and administered by Rykomusic, Ltd. (PRS)
